EmailTemplate.subject: Apology for Login failure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact summer2014@the-challenge.org
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Further to our email today supplying you with your login and password to the Staffing Website, if you have been unable to Login, please accept our apologies.
We have now rectified the fault and for the vast majority of people this will now work. If you are still having problems please contact us on summer2014@the-challenge.org to resolve your login issue.
Thank you for your patience and once again apologies for any inconvenience caused.
Best wishes,
The Challenge
CR: 3.3.
